__e: I'm like the last of my kind now.
The only survivor of the party and the only one who at least does some work.
So, here I am. All the others are long gone. I'm the only one left.
I thought I was the last of a dying breed.
And to answer your question, there are two reasons... why I'm looking at you like this.
I may well be the last of my family alive.
You're the last surviving member of the council.
He was the sole survivor of the attack on the safe house where you were rescued.
And I realized, if I'm the surviving member of the Cabinet, if I'm the President, I can be a part of making it happen here.
